### STDDEV OVER TIME
Calculates the population standard deviation over time of a numeric field.

```esql
TS k8s
| STATS max_stddev_cost=MAX(STDDEV_OVER_TIME(network.cost)) BY cluster, time_bucket = TBUCKET(1minute)
```
